Articles.Content: Hello, so I used to be active on the forums up to about a year or so ago, and same with the game. However, I have just started getting back into ksp, and started to want to interact with the very supportive forum again, so hello! again.
Welcome back.  And your specialist subject is ... ? (Go on, you know you want to tell us, it's interaction.  We do want to hear too *grin*)
Welcome back.  It's hard to kick a habit like KSP.
